module.title: Shop
module.description: Basic shop with cart, supporting several catalogs via shop bridge mechanism. For payment or shipping you need to install another module.
module.log: Added support for article description in tables and mails.
Added mail attachments for revocation of orders or registered services.
Improved localisation of customer and conditions panels.
Improved cart markup, support white icons in tabs.
Adjust to new version of shop bridge.
Skip payment if cart price is 0.
Extend customer model by geo coordinates.
Use authenticated user data as customer.
Note payment method and ID in order model.
Decrease article stock quantity if order has been payed.
Add mail for not payed orders.
Support responsive design in cart and checkout.
Add helper for order facts, used in mails.
Add support for new finish panel hook.
Add payment block in customer order mail.
Hide payment tab if cart content is free or empty.
Extract customer handling to own controller and view.
Migrate old customer date into new structure.
Replace session storage by new cart model.
Integrate shop jobs from other app modules.
Refactoring to use shop user instead of shop customer.
Move job definitions to module configuration.
Code update on types and strictness.
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>shop_customers` ADD `institution` VARCHAR( 100 ) NULL AFTER `password` ;

ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>shop_orders` ADD `price` DECIMAL(8,2) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AFTER `status`, ADD `priceTaxed` DECIMAL(8,2) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AFTER `price`; ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>shop_order_positions` ADD `price` DECIMAL(6,2) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AFTER `quantity`, ADD `priceTaxed` DECIMAL(6,2) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AFTER `price`;

ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>shop_customers` ADD `longitude` FLOAT NULL AFTER `password`, ADD `latitude` FLOAT NULL AFTER `longitude`; ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>shop_orders` ADD `userId` INT(11) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `sessionId`;

ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>shop_orders` CHANGE `editedAt` `modifiedAt` DECIMAL(12,0) UNSIGNED NULL; ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>shop_order_positions` CHANGE `editedAt` `modifiedAt` DECIMAL(12,0) UNSIGNED NULL;

ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>shop_customers` CHANGE `billing_institution` `billing_institution` VARCHAR(100) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL, CHANGE `billing_firstname` `billing_firstname` VARCHAR(40) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT '', CHANGE `billing_lastname` `billing_lastname` VARCHAR(100) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT '', CHANGE `billing_tnr` `billing_tnr` VARCHAR(40) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL, CHANGE `billing_country` `billing_country` VARCHAR(100) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT '', CHANGE `billing_city` `billing_city` VARCHAR(200) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT '', CHANGE `billing_postcode` `billing_postcode` VARCHAR(10) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT '', CHANGE `billing_address` `billing_address` VARCHAR(200) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL, CHANGE `billing_phone` `billing_phone` VARCHAR(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL, CHANGE `billing_email` `billing_email` VARCHAR(200) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT '';

ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>shop_orders` CHANGE `channel` `paymentMethod` VARCHAR( 50 ) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL; ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>shop_orders` ADD `paymentId` INT( 11 ) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `paymentMethod`;
